data.title: AXIA SPORTS Our Team
data.text: Mike Miller has nearly 20 years of experience as an Associate Head Coach, Recruiting Coordinator, and Scout at some of the most successful collegiate programs in the United States, including UConn, Duke and Syracuse. Miller has been responsible for recruiting and coaching some of the top players in college soccer and has built many recruiting classes which were ranked in the top 10 nationally. He has recruited and coached 30 players that have been drafted into MLS, including 12 first-round picks. During his college coaching career, he was honored as a top assistant in College Soccer by College Soccer News on 4 different occasions and by Top Drawer Soccer as well. Miller also had a stint as the Scout for Sporting Kansas City in MLS. Mike has developed outstanding relationships, both domestically and internationally, during his career as a college coach and scout and brings a unique expertise over the American market.
